data.description:
The 2019 update finally arrives! With the brand new application, watching your favorite movies has never been so immersive and easy to navigate! Watch the movies and Youtube videos in the extremely realistic sceneries (IMAX Screen Size, Home, Pool to choose from).

FEATURES
4K & All Media Formats support
Android 9 (PIE) Support
Youtube Support (Search/Channels/Playlists/2D/3D/No private videos yet)
Youtube User Login Support
4 Extremely Realistic Sceneries (IMAX-Size, Home, Pool, Scary)
Seat Selection (6 Seats per Scenery)
Void Scenery with Lock Feature
Intuitive User Interface
Advanced Dynamic Lighting
LAN PLEX support ( DLNA server)
LAN shared media (SMB2 & SMB3 Support /UPNP/DLNA media servers)
Support for 2D / 3D Movies (SBS/Over-Under)
Support for 360 / 180 movies (2D/3D)
Embedded Audio & Subtitles 
Subtitle Encoding Types
Favorites and Last-Viewed
Video Settings (Brightness, Saturation, Contrast, Aspect Ratio)
Many more...

Contact me at:
sboczek@PixelEdgeGames.com

changelog.change_log:
- 2019 Update with Improved / Rewritten every aspect of the application!
- Huge Optimizations
- Android 9 (PIE) Support
- Youtube Channel/Playlist support
- Youtube user login support (no private videos yet)
- Entirely new and intuitive User Interface
- Swipe/Scroll Mechanics (Playback/180/360)
- SMB2 / SMB3 Support
- Saving Movies Settings/Properties
- Seat Selection Improved (6 seat options per scenery)
- Video Settings (Brighntess/Saturation/Contrast/Aspect Ratio)
- Many More...
